mdRecord.dcterms:title: Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru of the Dominion of India Signing the Guest Book, October 12, 1949
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru of the Dominion of India signing the guest book in the dining room at Mount Vernon. His wife Kamala Nehru stands at left and his daughter Indira looks over his shoulder at the right of the photograph.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Mansion
Mansion interiors
Dining Room
